allocate(val(n), pos(n))

! Read the n values into val array:

read(*, *) (val(i), i = 1, n)

! Initialize pos array with 1 to n:

do i = 1, n 

    pos(i) = i 

end do 

current_length = n 

ans = 0 

do while (current_length > 0) if (val(1) <= m) then 

        ans = pos(1) 

        current_length = current_length -1 

        if (current_length >= 1) then ! 如果 after dec, there are elements, shifting:

    else 

        ! val(1) > m 

        new_val = val(1) - m 

        c_pos = pos(1) 

        ! Shift elements from 2 to current_length into 1 to current_length-1 

        do i =1, current_length -1 

            val(i) = val(i+1) 

            pos(i) = pos(i+1) 

        end do 

        ! append the new_val and c_pos at the end 

        val(current_length) = new_val 

        pos(current_length) = c_pos 

    end if 

end do 

write(*, *) ans 

end program

More formally, let’s denote by T the minimum time such that at least m students have exited the classroom by time T. You need to find the number of the student who exited last at time T. program codeforces_450_A

implicit none

integer :: n, m, current_length, i, ans, new_val

integer, allocatable :: val(:), pos(:)

! Read inputs:

read(*, *) n, m 

allocate(val(n), pos(n))

! Read the n values into val array:

read(*, *) (val(i), i = 1, n)

! Initialize pos array with 1 to n:

do i = 1, n 

    pos(i) = i 

end do 

current_length = n 

ans = 0 

do while (current_length > 0) 

    if (val(1) <= m) then 

        ans = pos(1) 

        current_length = current_length -1 

        if (current_length >= 1) then ! 如果 after dec, there are elements, shifting:

            do i =1, current_length 

                val(i) = val(i+1) 

                pos(i) = pos(i+1) 

            end do 

        end if 

    else 

        ! val(1) > m 

        new_val = val(1) - m 

        c_pos = pos(1) 

        ! Shift elements from 2 to current_length into 1 to current_length-1 

        do i =1, current_length -1 

            val(i) = val(i+1) 

            pos(i) = pos(i+1) 

        end do 

        ! append the new_val and c_pos at the end 

        val(current_length) = new_val 

        pos(current_length) = c_pos 

    end if 

end do 

write(*, *) ans 

end program
